segments.text: Those kids are up to something, I can tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a stool, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching his arm up, trying to grab a cookie from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, looking up at him with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, waiting for him to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're doing this right under the woman's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely unaware, just standing there drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they don't hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching now, I think he's almost got it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't watch, this is making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
